result.eng: The Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ga: ba mhór cúis na gaeilge le m'athair
result.orig: ba mhór cúis na gaeilge le m'athair
result.html: ba mhór cúis na gaeilge le m'athairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁór cúis na gaeilge le m'aṫairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.

result.eng: I feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.ga: is ábhar imní dhom é
result.orig: is ábhar imní dhom é
result.html: is ábhar imní dhom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.ponchtml: is áḃar imní ḋom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.

result.eng: It is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ga: an-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é
result.orig: an-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é
result.html: an-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea éIt is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ponchtml: an-údar dóċais don dtoḋċaí is ea éIt is a big cause for hope for the future.

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ga: ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.orig: ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.html: ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'ÉireannachI find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ponchtml: ní údar náire domsa a ḃeiṫ i m'ÉireannaċI find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: They turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.
result.ga: tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféise
result.orig: tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféise
result.html: tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféiseThey turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.
result.ponchtml: tiontaíonn siad cúis ṁaiṫ ina ceap áiféiseThey turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.

result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na stát aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na stát aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na stát aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na stát aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
